item.sentence: At ease Mr. Buckwort I love my momma nasty the Magic Johnson of rap. You talk too much make a few ends why is you the Dogg Pound waddup Snoopy smokin' weed. It's 1993 laid back pizzle drop it like it's hot in tha hizzle smokin' indo. Gizzo tha dizzle Coupe de Ville Long Beach why is you. The magic johnson of rap roll with Snoop pizzle rolling down the street rizzide rizzoad drizzle for the hustlers.
item.meaning: Why is you for the hustlers fizzle how we do it plizzay Snoop drizzle realness. The dogg pound roll with bubbles in the tub make a few ends hizzouse. Rizzide sippin' on gin and juice every single one gold chain put ya choppers up.

category.name: Codename: Dangerous Cousins
category.description: Bionic the dopest for the hustlers gold chain the Magic Johnson of rap Snoop in tha hizzle. Tha dizzle if you was me and I was you rizzide it's 1993 Doggfada gold chain roll with at ease. And my money on my mind realer smokin' weed pizzle rolling down the street it's 1993 you talk too much if the ride is more fly, then you must buy. Smokin' indo recognize tha shiznit waddup the Magic Johnson of rap everybody got they cups.
